alarm.description: Configure the alarm on the server and kick all new users.

member.description: The member to get the avatar.

ban.description: Bans a member from the server.

blockword.description: Blocks the use of words on the server.

case.description: Displays the information of a moderation case.

cases.description: Displays the list of server moderation cases.

follow.description: Follows our news channel in this channel.

clear.usage:
[Amount(2-100)]
[@User/User ID] [Amount(2-100)]
all
match [Text] [Amount(2-100)]
not [Text] [Amount(2-100)]
startswith [Text] [Amount(2-100)]
endswith [Text] [Amount(2-100)]
links [Amount(2-100)]
invites [Amount(2-100)]
images [Amount(2-100)]
mentions [Amount(2-100)]
embeds [Amount(2-100)]
bots [Amount(2-100)]
before [Message ID] [Amount(2-100)]
after [Message ID] [Amount(2-100)]
around [Message ID] [Amount(2-100)]

clearwarn.description: Removes a warning from the server.

detect.description: Detects dangerous users in the server.

genpassword.description: Generates a password according to the parameters provided.

info.description: Shows the information of an user.

invite.description: Shows the information of an invite

kick.description: Kicks a member from the server.

modstats.description: Shows the stats of the server moderation cases

notification.description: Configures the alarm of malicious user joins.

reason.description: Sets the reason of a moderation case.
reason.example: 54 Breaking 16th rule: Spam is not allowed in the server.

report.description: Reports an user to be added to the forceban.

reportbug.description: Reports an error to my developers to make it be solved.
reportbug.example: The alarm turns on by itself and there is no way to turn it off.

role.description: Shows the information of a role.

setlang.description: Sets the bot language in the server.

settings.description: Shows the server settings and information of how to configure it.

softban.description: Bans and innmediatly unbans a member to delete messages.

suggest.example: I'd like you to create a #gaming channel where the users can speak about that theme there.

suggestions.usage:
help
list
approve [SuggestionID] <Comment>
deny [SuggestionID] <Comment>
delete [SuggestionID]
setchannel [ChannelID/#Channel/disable]
setapproved [ChannelID/#Channel/disable]
setdenied [ChannelID/#Channel/disable]
questionEmoji enable / disable
autoaccept [Number(1-1000)] / disable
massapprove [SuggestionID]...
massdeny [SuggestionID]...
massdelete [SuggestionID]...
editcomment [SuggestionID] [New staff comment]
setrole [RoleID/@Role]
setpalette ayu / tailwind / default / p1 / p2 / p3 / n1 / n2 / n3
setcommandschannel [ChannelID/#Channel]
setcooldown [Number(1-60)] / disable
setemoji [PositiveEmoji] [NegativeEmoji] <UndecidedEmoji> / disable

support.description: Request support to our staff in case of raid.

topbots.description: Shows the top Discord bot list.

unban.description: Unbans a user from the server.

verification.usage: off / setmode <Mode(approval, reaction, verification, captcha)> / setguest <@Role / Role ID> / setuser <@Role / Role ID> / setchannel <#Channel / Channel ID> / setmessage <Message ID>

verifyme.description: Gives you the user role in the server.

warn.description: Adverts a user from its bad behavior.

warnings.description: Shows the warn list of the server or member.

whitelist.description: Configures the whitelist in your server.

setup.description: Setup the bot settings in a simple way with reactions and buttons.
